Text: Thank you for sharing this MANTESH and the seeders for keeping this torrent alive.

I have this in hardcopy - I found it very useful for learning how to incorporate more quick & easy visuals in my note-taking. I'm a 'words' person, but have found that using visuals more helps my memory and comprehension - plus it's fun! The book gives you that little bit of help to start doodling even if you're someone who 'can't draw'. Well structured. Recommended.
